name: NBA Odds & Arbitrage Agent
description: AI-optimized NBA betting odds and arbitrage finder. Endpoints: /odds/nba ($0.005) - compressed odds from DraftKings, FanDuel, BetMGM, Caesars. /arb/nba ($0.03) - arbitrage opportunities with 1%+ edge. Data cached 60s. Schema in 402 response.
